sense.gloss: manual labor, manual labour, toil, work
to work, to labor, to labour
to function, to operate, to be effective, to work (i.e. ... works), to come into play
to commit (e.g. a crime), to perpetrate, to do, to act, to practise, to practice
action, activity, workings, function, operation, movement, motion
Ministry of Labour (now Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare)
to work on (someone), to appeal to, to make approaches to, to pressure, to exert influence on, to seek action from
(husband and wife) both working, dual income

sdata.j: ↑働↑↓はたら↓くより↑楽↑↓たの↓しむほうが↑簡単↑↓かんたん↓である。
sdata.e: It's easier to have fun than to work.

sdata.j: ↑日曜日↑↓にちようび↓でも、↑働↑↓はたら↓きます。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑年↑↓とし↓だったころと↑同↑↓おな↓じほどよく↑働↑↓はたら↓く。
sdata.e: You work as hard as he did at your age.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑歳↑↓とし↓だったころとほぼ↑同↑↓おな↓じほどよく↑働↑↓はたら↓く。
sdata.e: You work as hard as he did at your age.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑日曜日↑↓にちようび↓に↑働↑↓はたら↓く↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓があるのですか。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑働↑↓はたら↓きすぎです。
↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑働↑↓はたら↓きすぎだよ。しばらくのんびりしたら。
sdata.e: You are working too hard. Take it easy for a while.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑失敗↑↓しっぱい↓しないように↑一生懸命↑↓いっしょうけんめい↓↑働↑↓はたら↓かなければならない。
sdata.e: You must work hard in order not to fail.

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓↑働↑↓はたら↓きすぎだよ。↑疲↑↓つか↓れてるんじゃない？
sdata.e: You work too hard these days. Aren't you tired?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑今週↑↓こんしゅう↓は↑随分↑↓ずいぶん↓↑働↑↓はたら↓いたね。
sdata.e: You worked a lot this week.
